title: Purple Inn Boutique Hotel
address: No.129,130, Madeshwara Ngr Lyt, High Tension Rd,2nd Stg, Vijayanagar, Mysuru 570017.
details: <div>Purple Inn, situated within 5 km from Mysore Junction, features a multi-cuisine restaurant and bar and offers free internet access to its guests.</div><div>&nbsp;It has 14 accommodation units that are divided into two categories Standard and Deluxe for guests to choose from. All rooms are air-conditioned and feature standard amenities like free internet connection, direct dial phone and satellite television. In order to make the stay comfortable for guests, the hotel offers facilities like laundry, safe deposit box and power backup. Owing to its affordable tariff and best-in-class services, the hotel is an ideal pick for Mysore visit.</div>

title: SK Residency
address: Rajkamal Talkies Road, Dhanvantri Road Cross, Devaraja Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: <div>SK Residency welcomes you to a world of comfort, at the heart of Mysore city. Here, you will find a home away from home.&nbsp;</div><div>With unmatched service and warm hospitality, you are sure to make SK Residency a permanent abode whenever you visit Cotton City. <br><br></div><div>Centrally located, we are just 9 KMS from the Airport, 2 KMS from the Railway Station, and walking distance from Central Bus Stand.</div>

title: Royal Inn
tag_words: 3-star hotel, Food, Dining, Lodging, South & North Indian cuisines
address: 435, K.R.S. Road, Metagalli,Ring Road Junction, Mysuru, Karnataka 570016
details: ROYAL INN is ideally located on Brindavan Garden road close to both the railway station &amp; the tourist attractions in Mysore. <br><br>The hotel with three star facilities offers comfortable &amp; luxurious accommodation, exquisite service &amp; a multi-cuisine restaurant that offers a delectable range of continental, South &amp; North Indian cuisines. An ideal hotel for both corporate &amp; leisure loving patrons.<br>

title: Lalitha Mahal Palace Hotel
address: Lalitha Mahal Nagar, Mysuru, Karnataka 570011
details: The formal, stately rooms are individually decorated with antique-style furnishings and plush fabrics. Some are housed in the palace's turrets, and suites add separate living rooms. All have TVs, and most have balconies. Room service is available.<br><br>There an opulent fine-dining restaurant, an al fresco eatery and a grand bar. Other amenities include a fitness room, an outdoor pool, tennis courts and a billiard room, plus landscaped gardens and a helipad.<br>

title: Parklane Hotel
address: Sri Harsha Rd, Lashkar Mohalla, Mandi Mohalla, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: Featuring local artwork, the airy rooms with rustic accents offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges. Upgraded rooms add separate living areas, and some rooms have balconies. Room service is available.<br><br>Amenities include a quirky international restaurant with a beer garden, plus a terrace and an outdoor pool with a waterfall. There's also a library and a gift shop. Complimentary parking is provided.<br>

title: Sandesh The Prince
address: #3, Nethra Nivas, Nazarbad Main Road, Mysuru, Karnataka 570010
details: In the city historic centre, this upscale hotel is 1.1 km from Mysore Palace and 5 km from Chamundeshwari Temple, perched at the top of Chamundi Hills. <br><br>The refined rooms come with flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, minibars, and tea and coffeemaking equipment. Suites add living rooms and Jacuzzis. Room service is available.<br><br>Breakfast is free, and the hotel features a restaurant, a pub, a coffee shop and a bar. Additional amenities include a gym, an indoor pool and a full-service spa<br>

title: Country Inn & Suites By Carlson
address: Plot No. 345/A, Hebbal Industrial Area, Near Infosys Campus, Mysuru, Karnataka 570016
details: This upscale hotel is 9 km from the Krishna Raja Sagara lake, 10 km from the Brindavan Gardens and 11 km from Mysore Palace. <br><br>The modern rooms feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and desks. They also offer seating areas, minibars, and tea and coffeemakers. Suites add separate living rooms with sofas and private balconies. Room service is available.<br><br>The hotel offers a free breakfast buffet and parking. There's also a casual restaurant serving international cuisine, an upscale Indian restaurant, a poolside bar and a grill. Other amenities include an outdoor pool, a kids pool, a children's play area and a gym. Pets are allowed.<br>

title: The President Hotel
address: 2723, Near Hardinge Circle, Bangalore-Nilgiri Road, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: Relaxed rooms feature cable TV, free Wi-Fi, minibars and safes; Suites add living areas. Room service is on offer 24/7.<br><br>Complimentary breakfast is provided. Other amenities include a laid-back restaurant, a coffee shop and a lounge bar. Valet parking is available.<br>

title: Chittaranjan Palace The Green Hotel
address: 2270, Vinoba Road, Jayalakshmipuram, Mysore, Mysuru, Karnataka 570005
details: The Chittaranjan Palace, built for Mysores princesses, has been lovingly restored as a charming hotel. In extensive gardens, with formal lawns and shaded pergolas, and fringed by majestic trees, the hotel is an oasis of calm.<br><br>Renovated and furnished using traditional Indian crafts, the hotel offers comfortable surroundings, friendly staff, and a restful, creative atmosphere. Guests have come for a night and stayed for a month!<br>

title: Hotel Mahesh Prasad, Mysore
address: Ballal Circle, Chamarajapura, Chamarajapuram Mohalla, Lakshmipuram, Near RTO Office, Mysuru, Karnataka 570004
details: Hotel&nbsp;Mahesh Prasad is pure vegetarian hotel. All breakfast menus are to be tasted. Lunch and dinner are good and best place for veg.<br><div><br></div><div><br></div>

title: Oasis Hotel
address: Plot No 75, M&O, 75-K, Part-1, Industrial Area, Hootagalli, Mysuru, Karnataka 570018
details: <div>The Oasis Hotel is situated in Hootagalli area of Mysore city, just 3 kms from Mysore – Madikere highway and 18 kms from KRS dam. The hotel has 44 air-conditioned guestrooms to choose from and a multicusine restaurant to serve authentic Karnataka cuisine to the guests. Guests on a business trip are facilitated with audio-visual, equipment and Oasis Hotel also provides a plethora of guest amenities like airport/ bus stand transfers ( on chargeable basis ) and a travel desk.</div><div><br></div><div>The hotel also provides WIFI , laundry facility and long term parking within the hotel premises.</div>

title: Ginger Hotel
address: Plot No. 678, 4, Nazarabad Mohalla, Vasant Mahal Road Near Nazarabad Police Station, Opp. Vasant Mahal, Mysuru, Karnataka 570010
details: <div>Ginger Hotels welcome you in Ginger Mysore a unique budget hotel in Mysore at a perfect location. Hotel offers services &amp; facilities like gymnasium, restaurant, Wi-Fi &amp; conference hall which makes Ginger Mysore one of the finest 3 star hotels in Mysore.</div><div><br></div><div>The city of Mysore is rich in its cultural heritage and architectural monuments. Let money not be your concern while visiting this city. Enjoy a memorable stay at Ginger Mysore - one of the finest budget hotels in the city.</div>

title: Kamat Hotel Mysore
address: After Exhibition Ground,Near Gun House Ooty Road, Ooty/Nanjangud Road, Mysore 570004, India
details: Kamat hotel is famous for its (corn flatbread) and good quality, authentic North Karnataka fares. Go for their thali meals which are wholesome and amazing to taste. This place ideal for a leisurely Sunday breakfast, brunch or for a laidback holiday meal. Enjoy some of the finest regional South Indian cuisines in this place, with complimentary curds and buttermilks. Go for the fruit salad only if you prefer it sweetened with sugar syrup.<br>

title: Country International
address: Plot No. 345/A, Hebbal Industrial Area, Near Infosys Campus, Mysuru, Karnataka 570016
details: Country Inns &amp; Suites by Carlson, Mysore is Luxury hotel within the Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group portfolio. This hotel is designed for both business and leisure travelers and provide complimentary hot breakfast and high-speed Internet. Country Inns &amp; Suites By Carlson,Mysore is owned by Lotus Pond Hotels Pvt Ltd and managed under licensing agreements with the Carlson Rezidor Hotel Group.<br>

title: KVC International Hotel
address: Hotel KVC International, Krishna Vilas Road, Chamrajpura, Mysore, Karnataka 570004, India
details: Hotel KVC International. Located plumb in the centre of the city,It is a real delight for those seeking a comfortable and hassle free stay. Ideal for both tourists and the business communtiy, we offer services that are truly international.<br>

title: Hotel Original Vinayaka Mylari
address: Shop No. 79, Near Police Station, Nazarbad Main Rd, Doora, Mysuru, Karnataka 570010
details: Dose with Sagu and coconut chutney it tastes more heavenly.<br>

title: Sepoy Grande
tag_words: Awesome Roof Top Restaurant in Mysore
address: 62B, MG Road, Opp JSS Hospital, Mysuru, Karnataka 570004
details:
Sepoy Grande has been favourably located at the Heart of the Mysuru 
city. Witnessing the best glimpse of the majestic Chamundi Hills, take 
in a day at theworld famous Mysore Palace, or spend an afternoon 
shopping for silk sarees, visiting exciting Mysore Zoo and Karanji lake 
is just a walk away. Sport enthusiast will enjoy the Mysore Race course 
or a challeging round at the golf course which is also few steps away 
from our facility

title: Fortune JP Palace
tag_words: 4 star hotel in mysore, Hotel Fortune JP Palace in mysore,One of The Best luxury hotels in Mysore
address: #3, Abba Road, Nazarbad, Mysuru, Karnataka 570007
details: Set in landscaped gardens with views of the Chamundi Hills, this refined hotel is 2.6 km from Mysore Palace and 12 km from Mysore Airport .<br><br>The plush rooms and suites with earth tone decor feature free Wi-Fi, safes and flat-screen TVs, as well as minibars and tea and coffeemaking equipment. Suites add living areas, and room service is available 24-hours.<br><br>Parking is free, along with breakfast served in a stylish all-day eatery. There's also an Oriental restaurant and a sophisticated lounge bar. Other amenities include an outdoor pool, a spa and a gym, plus a business centre and meeting and event space. Airport transfers can be arranged.<br>

title: The Atrium Boutique Hotel
tag_words: 3 star hotel in mysore,  Atrium Boutique, peaceful ambience
address: No.110/1A1, Bangalore- Mysore Road, Near Columbia Asia Hospital, Mysore, Karnataka 570003
details: On the northern outskirts of Mysuru, this sophisticated hotel is 3.5 km from amusement rides at GRS Fantasy Park and 6 km from the grand Mysuru Palace.<br><br>Contemporary rooms feature complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, minibars, and tea and coffeemakers. Upgraded rooms add sitting areas, kitchenettes and/or balconies; suites have separate living rooms. Room service is on offer 24/7. Kids age 11 and under stay free with an adult.<br><br>There's a casual eatery with a bar, and a vegetarian restaurant. Other amenities include an outdoor pool, a fitness room, and a day spa offering massage and beauty treatments. There's also a banquet hall and free parking.<br>

title: Hotel Royal Orchid Metropole
tag_words: 4 Star Hotel - Beautiful Ambience and Decor Hotel in Mysore
address: 451/5, JLB Road, Chamarajapuram Mohalla, Lakshmipuram, Mysuru, Karnataka 575005
details:
Royal Orchid Metropole is a perfect blend of old world charm and 
modernization. Situated in the heart of Mysore city and spread over 2.5 
acres of lush green landscaping, it has been classified as a Heritage 
hotel.&nbsp;<div><br></div><div>Its imperial arches, imposing pillars and ornate corridors 
capture the old world charm of this majestic guesthouse built by the 
former Maharaja of Mysore in 1920 for his distinguished guests.</div>

title: The Quorum Hotel
address: #2257/1 Vinoba Road, Near Kala Mandir, Mysore - 570005.
details: This high-end modern hotel with a geometric glass facade is a 12-minute walk from Mysore Junction railway station, 2.1 km from Mysore Palace and 3.5 km from Mysore Zoo.<br><br>Refined contemporary rooms feature flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi (fee) and minibars, as well as free bottled water, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms add sofabeds.<br><br>The hotel serves free continental breakfast. There's a 24-hour international restaurant, a garden restaurant and a bar. Other amenities include a fitness room and a rooftop pool with an Egyptian-themed deck.<br>

title: Southern Star
tag_words: 4 Star Hotel in Mysore - City Center Hotel in Msyore.
address: 13, Vinoba Rd, Gokulam 2nd Stage, Gokulam, Mysuru, Karnataka 570005
details: Set on 1.6 hectares of lush gardens, this modern hotel is a 10-minute walk from Mysore Junction railway station, 1.9 km from Mysore Palace and 7 km from Lalitha Mahal palace.<br><br>Understated rooms feature flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, as well as minibars. Upgraded rooms add 4-poster beds and whirlpool baths. Room service is available 24 hours.<br><br>Amenities include free breakfast, an informal, multi-cuisine restaurant and a casual eatery by the outdoor pool, as well as a lobby bar and a pastry shop. There are also Ayurvedic treatment rooms, as well as a gym and 3 meeting/event rooms.<br>

title: United 21 Hotel
address: 43/A, B.N. Road, Hardinge Circle, Banglore Nilgiri road, Opposite Woodland Theatre, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: United 21 Hotel has been favorably located at the Heart of the Mysuru city.<br><br>Contemporary rooms with tiled floors and wood furnishings feature en suite bathrooms, cable TV and free Wi-Fi, plus safes, minibars and tea and coffee making equipment. <br><br>Upgraded rooms add kitchenettes, dining/living areas and furnished balconies. Room service is available.<br><br><br>

title: Hotel Crystal Paark Inn
address: No. 2, Nazarbad Main Road, Opp. Park, Nazarbad, Mysuru, Karnataka 570010
details: <div>Hotel Crystal Paark Inn is situated in Nazarbad Main Road,which is walkable distance from the Hardinge Circle and from Gandhi Square.</div><div><br></div><div>The contemporary rooms and suites feature park of city views, free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, plus tea and coffee making facilities; some also include balconies. Suites add DVD players and round beds. There's 24-hour room service.</div><div><br></div><div>A free breakfast buffet is served in a casual restaurant. Other amenities include a funky bar/lounge, a spa and a rooftop terrace with a pergola and a fountain sitting area.</div><div><br></div>

title: Pai Vista
tag_words: Hotel Pai Vista- 3 Star Hotels in Mysore
address: 35/A, Behind Bhima Jewellery, Bangalore Nilgiri Road, Doora, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: Pai Vista is located near to Mysore Suburban Bus Stand.<br><br>Streamlined rooms with conservative decor feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screens and mini fridges, as well as desks, sitting areas and tea and coffeemakers. Suites add balconies and separate living rooms with sofas. Room service is available.<br><br>The hotel offers free parking and breakfast. There is also an upscale restaurant serving international cuisine, a casual Indian and Chinese restaurant, a hip bar, and indoor and outdoor pools. Other amenities include a gym, a spa, a business centre and conference rooms.<br>

title: Hotel Ruchi The Prince
tag_words: 4 Star Hotel in Mysore - Fine Dining Hotel in Mysore
address: 986/624, Mysore-Hunsur Main Road, Hinkal, Near Aishwarya Petrol Bunk, Mysuru, Karnataka 570017
details: Set 4.2 km from the Railway Museum Mysore, this low-key modern hotel is also 8 km from Mysore Palace and 16 km from the Brindavan Gardens.<br><br>The straightforward rooms come with flat-screen TVs, tea and coffeemaking equipment, desks and sofas. Room service is available.<br><br>There's a relaxed restaurant and a trendy bar. A children's play area is available as are safety deposit boxes.<br>

title: Hotel Roopa
address: 2724/C, Bangalore - Nilgiri Road, Mysuru, Karnataka 570001
details: <div>Set in a modern tower with a glass facade, this polished hotel is 0.8 km from Mysore Palace, 1.5 km from Mysore Zoo and 2.4 km from Mysore Junction railway station.&nbsp;</div><div><br></div><div>Featuring polished-wood floors and subtle decor, the chic rooms have free Wi-Fi, ceiling fans and flat-screen TVs. Upgraded rooms also come with air-conditioning, tea and coffee making facilities, and/or safes. Suites add separate sitting areas.</div><div><br></div><div>Breakfast and parking are free. There's an informal restaurant that serves international cuisine, as well as a fine-dining option and a bar. There's also a spa that offers Ayurvedic treatments.</div>

title: Radisson Blu Plaza
address: 1 MG Road, Adjacent to Mall of Mysore , Karnataka, India 570010
details: <div>Hotel Policy&nbsp;</div><div>The standard check-in time is 12:00 PM and the standard check-out time is 11:00 AM. Early check-in or late check-out is strictly subjected to availability and may be chargeable by the hotel. Any early check-in or late check-out request must be directed and reconfirmed with hotel directlySpecial Note: There maybe supplementary charges for Xmas and New Year as per hotel policy, kindly pay the supplementary charges directly at the hotel..</div><div><br></div><div>Dining</div><div>Bar / Lounge ,Multi Cuisine Restaurant ,Coffee Shop / Cafe,Kitchen available (home cook food on request),Vegetarian Food / Jain Food Available,Rooftop Garden,Food Facility,RO Water Purification System,Restaurant</div>
